title: First Round of Theme Songs Submitted by Listeners + Lunchbox Gets an Offer from A Caller for his Valentine’s Business + Bobby Helps A Listener Scammed by a Fake Country Star Account
itunes:title: First Round of Theme Songs Submitted by Listeners + Lunchbox Gets an Offer from A Caller for his Valentine’s Business + Bobby Helps A Listener Scammed by a Fake Country Star Account
description:
Bobby recently asked for some listeners to try their shot at creating a theme song for our show. He plays the first batch that we received to see if there are any contenders. A listener called in who wanted to buy one of Lunchbox’s Valentine’s day reservations as part of his new business venture. Bobby helps out a listener who got scammed online by a fake Trace Adkins and fake manager.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
